entry.title: Tahoe Tack 14” Replacement Leather Breakaway Crown for Mini Horse Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Accessories
Price: 4.99

Our miniature horse sized leather breakaway halter crown piece is a great replacement for your old, worn-out, or damaged crownpiece and was designed specifically to fit mini horse sized halters. This crown piece measures 14” long and is ⅝” wide, making it compatible with most leather or nylon miniature horse halters.

  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST MINI HALTERS - this leather crown piece measures 14” long by ⅝” wide and has holes on either side for maximum adjustability.
  • INCREASES YOUR HORSE’S SAFETY - breakaway halters are designed with a leather crown that will break under pressure in order to free your horse to help prevent injury or loss of life.
  • DURABLE SOLID LEATHER - this crown piece is made from durable and attractive flat leather. With proper care, this crown piece will last for years before needing to be replaced.
  • GREAT FOR THE PASTURE AND TRAILER - breakaway crowns are ideal for use when your horse is turned out, inside the trailer, or tied up to crossties in order to prevent injury.
  • DEEP HAVANA BROWN COLOR - this leather crown piece comes in a dark Havana brown that is designed to best match most leather or nylon halters.

entry.title: Snow Proof Weatherproofing Leather Care Waterproofing Paste, 3 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Leather Care
Price: 4.50

This colorless and odorless formula helps prevent mildew, dry rot, salt stains and scuff marks while preserving, waterproofing, restoring and softening leather. Great for boots and shoes. Product may darken light leathers and is not recommended for suede.

  • Colorless and odorless
  • Prevents mildew, dry rot, salt stains, and scuff marks
  • Preserves, waterproofs, restores and softens leather
  • Great for use on boots, shoes, tack

entry.title: Oakwood Liquid Saddle Soap Leather Conditioner and Cleaner 16.9 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Leather Care
Price: 12.95

Oakwood liquid saddle soap has a neutral pH-balanced formula that not only is gentle on leather, but also tough on dirt, grime, and stains. No water is necessary with Oakwood liquid saddle soap. It is fragrance-free and contains glycerine for gentle cleaning that will not strip the leather and is safe for use on stitching. This saddle soap is gentle enough for all of your leather tack and boots. 

 

  • Easy on your leather, tough on dirt
  • The neutral pH-balanced formula gently and effectively removes dirt, grime, and stains from leather items
  • No water is necessary; just wipe on and off
  • Fragrance-free formula contains glycerine for gentle, non-stripping cleansing
  • Safe for use on stitching
  • Ideal for Use on leather tack and saddlery, harnesses, shoes, boots, handbags, jackets, and accessories

entry.title: Fiebing's Saddle Soap Leather Conditioner and Cleaner - White 12 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Leather Care
Price: 8.95

Used all over the world on fine saddlery, boots, shoes and other smooth leather articles. Cleans leather and lubricates the fibers to prevent brittleness, all the while maintaining suppleness and strength. 

  • A Fiebing's signature product that is trusted by users all over the world to treat fine leather goods
  • Cleans and restores natural leather oils and polishes in one easy step
  • Perfect for cleaning a wide range of items, this paste saddle soap lubricates leather fibers to prevent brittleness
  • Simply apply to leather, let dry and polish with a soft cloth to achieve a beautiful luster

entry.title: Trigger Snaps Lot of 6 by Derby Originals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 9.95

Trigger Snaps Lot of 6 made by Derby Originals. Great for reins, halters, bridles, leads, leashes and more!
  • Round 5/8" nickle plated scissor snap
  • If you purchase a quantity of 1 you will get 6 trigger snaps
  • Intended for horse or stable use only

entry.title: Derby Originals Horse Cleaning and Bathing Sponges
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Grooming Tools
Price: 1.00

Use this sponge to bath your horse, clean your tack or any other chore in place of a rag. Conforms to fit your hand and the horse. Use it with any shampoo, conditioner, and cleaner that you like.

These sponges may have discolored/dyed spots that are yellow or green. This is normal discoloration and will not affect their performance.

These sponges measure approx. 6 1/4" x 3 1/4" x 1 5/8".

  • The perfect size for bathing and grooming
  • Also works great for cleaning tack

If we do not have your desired sponge color available, we will sub in other available colors of sponge.

entry.title: Derby Originals Replacement Leather Tab for Breakaway Horse Safety Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 2.75

Product Description: Derby Originals’ Replacement Leather Tab for Breakaway Horse Safety Halters can be used to easily turn your nylon halter into a breakaway halter. This allows you to inexpensively create a safe turnout halter without buying a new one! This thin piece of leather is designed so that if your horse panics, it will snap so that your horse can escape without becoming trapped. This has saved many horse’s lives during pasture or barn accidents.

  • CONVERT YOUR HALTER TO A SAFETY HALTER - our breakaway tabs can be used to easily turn your nylon halter into a breakaway halter. This allows you to inexpensively create a safe turnout halter without buying a new one!

  • USE TO REPAIR BREAKAWAY HALTERS - if your old breakaway halter has become worn or broken, all you have to do to replace it is easily undo the chicago screws and attach our replacement tab!
  • MAKE YOUR HALTER SAFER - this thin piece of leather is designed so that if your horse panics, it will snap so that your horse can escape without becoming trapped. This has saved many horse’s lives during pasture or barn accidents.
  • UNIQUE DOUBLE SCREW DESIGN - most breakaway tabs only feature one chicago screw, while ours has two for a more secure fit.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS - our breakaway halter tabs are available in two leather colors: dark oil and tan leather.

entry.title: Derby Originals 24” Replacement Leather Breakaway Crown for Horse Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 4.99

Our average horse sized leather breakaway halter crown piece is a great replacement for your old, worn-out, or damaged crownpiece and was designed specifically to fit most cob, average, large, or oversized sized halters. This crown piece measures 24” long and is 1” wide, making it compatible with most leather or nylon horse halters.

  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST MINI HALTERS - this leather crown piece measures 24” long by 1” wide and has holes on either side for maximum adjustability.
  • INCREASES YOUR HORSE’S SAFETY - breakaway halters are designed with a leather crown that will break under pressure in order to free your horse to help prevent injury or loss of life.
  • DURABLE SOLID LEATHER - this crown piece is made from durable and attractive flat leather. With proper care, this crown piece will last for years before needing to be replaced.
  • GREAT FOR THE PASTURE AND TRAILER - breakaway crowns are ideal for use when your horse is turned out, inside the trailer, or tied up to crossties in order to prevent injury.
  • DEEP HAVANA BROWN COLOR - this leather crown piece comes in a dark Havana brown that is designed to best match most leather or nylon halters.

entry.title: Derby Originals Animal Print Fleece Halter Cover Sets - Available in Multiple Styles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 1.95

If you are looking for a fun and colorful alternative to plain fleece halter covers, our Derby Originals Animal Print Fleece Halter Cover Sets are perfect for you! These halter cover sets include four fleece pieces to cover the crown, both cheek pieces, and the noseband to prevent halter rubs, irritation, and hair loss. These fleece halter covers are great for everyday use as well as use during trailering to provide extra protection. Features easy Velcro closures.

Halter Not Included

  • DESIGNED TO FIT ALMOST ANY HALTER - our fleece halter covers are designed to fit all major brands of leather and nylon halters, and can be cut down to size to fit smaller halters for animals such as mini horses.

  • AVAILABLE IN THREE COLORFUL OPTIONS - our animal print fleece halter covers are available in the color options White Zebra, Pink Zebra, and Leopard Print.
  • SET INCLUDES FOUR PIECES - this halter cover set includes four fleece pieces to cover the crown, both cheek pieces, and the noseband to prevent halter rubs, irritation, and hair loss that is common in these areas.
  • PREVENTS HALTER RUBS AND HAIR LOSS - our fleece covers are soft and plush and are designed to prevent your leather, nylon, or poly halter from rubbing and irritating your horse’s skin and causing hair loss.
  • NOT JUST FOR HORSE HALTERS - these fleece halter covers also make great fleece covers for collars, harnesses, or halters for other animals such as dogs and cats, cattle, sheep and goats, alpacas and llamas, and more!

entry.title: Derby Originals Nickel Plated Round Scissor Trigger Snaps 3/4"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 1.95

Great for reins, leads, halters, gates, and many other barn and house hold accessories!

DURABLE DESIGN - these sturdy nickel-plated scissor snaps are designed to last and hold up tough in a variety of applications.

IDEAL FOR MANY APPLICATIONS - these trigger snaps are great for use to make or customize horse tack and for use in the barn, out at pasture, or in the garage.

AVAILABLE IN LOTS OF 10 AND 25 - these snaps are available in quantities of 10 or 25.

¾” ROUND OPENING - these snaps feature a ¾” wide rounded bottom.
